description:
What are the Benefits for You?

  • Turn your Passion for Music into Money
  • Increase the Engagement of your Fan Community
  • Strengthen your Artist Brand and Fan Loyalty

Why take this Course?

Learn the best 7 ways to Make Money from your Music. I will go through them one by one, explaining the essence of them, and giving real examples of services you can use to implement them into your revenue strategy.

Making Money from whatever field you are in is not rocket science. In fact, it is actually quite easy. The first thing to be aware of are the various ways you have to monetise your work. Then you need to look for services that can help you implement these ways into practice. And finally you always need to promote, market and extend your reach.

Music is no different, and in this course you will get to know all those things, and even get a nudge in the right direction so that you can take action, get started, and start making money from your passion.

I have tried to condense my 15 years of experience as a Music Composer and Producer, into this course, so that you can get results without reading hundreds of books and articles, or producing several 100s of Music Tracks like I have.

Course Overview

You will learn the fundamental ways to monetise your Music in 7 different ways. Those 7 ways are: Selling your Music by Distributor, Selling your Tracks by Yourself, Selling Merchandise, Online Streaming, Youtube Ad Revenue, Fan Funding, Licensing your Music.

Your Music deserves a bigger reach and audience, and you deserve to be able to make a living from your craft.

Is it not time now to take your Music Career to the next level?

Well, then enroll today, I am waiting for you my Friend! =)

What is in this Course?
  • A concise and condensed learning experience
  • Step by step instructions on 7 ways to Make Money from your Music
  • A dynamic and personal style of teaching
  • Mixed formats to create more interest for you
title: Inspiration for Music Makers
